nodes.text: "Jedi Steps" is a concert piece written by John Williams that was used throughout the sequel trilogy films. The piece first appeared in the 2015 film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, and is developed in the 2017 film The Last Jedi as the leitmotif for Rey's Jedi training on Ahch-To.
A rendition of the motif is played in the mobile game Star Wars: Starfighter Missions.
